schools.name: Cuba Middle School
schools.school-summary: Cuba Middle School, a public school located in Cuba, IL, serves grades 6-8 in the Community Unit School District 3 Fulton County.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 3 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.district-name: Community Unit School District 3 Fulton County
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Cuba Sr High School
schools.school-summary: Cuba Sr High School, a public school located in Cuba, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Community Unit School District 3 Fulton County.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 7 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Cuba Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Cuba Elementary School, a public school located in Cuba, IL, serves grades PK-5 in the Community Unit School District 3 Fulton County.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 6 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
